movie.title: Hide and Seek
movie.description_intro: After her mother commits suicide in the bathtub, Emily Callaway is taken to live upstate in new surroundings to forget her traumatic past. Psychologist David, her father, learns that his daughter has a new friend, the enigmatic, never to be seen, imaginary (or not?) Charlie. A deadly game of hide-and-seek ensues. Who is Charlie? And what is troubling David in his dreams?
movie.description_full: After her mother commits suicide in the bathtub, Emily Callaway is taken to live upstate in new surroundings to forget her traumatic past. And what is troubling David in his dreams?

movies.title: Dracula
movies.summary: Dracula is searching for a woman who looks like his long dead wife.
movies.description_full: Dracula is searching for a woman who looks like his long dead wife.
movies.synopsis: Dracula is searching for a woman who looks like his long dead wife.

movies.title: Promising Young Woman
movies.summary: A young woman, traumatized by a tragic event in her past, seeks out vengeance against those who crossed her path.
movies.description_full: A young woman, traumatized by a tragic event in her past, seeks out vengeance against those who crossed her path.
movies.synopsis: A young woman, traumatized by a tragic event in her past, seeks out vengeance against those who crossed her path.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
movies.title_english: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
movies.title_long: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (2001)
movies.summary: An ancient Ring thought lost for centuries has been found, and through a strange twist of fate has been given to a small Hobbit named Frodo. When Gandalf discovers the Ring is in fact the One Ring of the Dark Lord Sauron, Frodo must make an epic quest to the Cracks of Doom in order to destroy it. However, he does not go alone. He is joined by Gandalf, Legolas the elf, Gimli the Dwarf, Aragorn, Boromir, and his three Hobbit friends Merry, Pippin, and Samwise. Through mountains, snow, darkness, forests, rivers and plains, facing evil and danger at every corner the Fellowship of the Ring must go. Their quest to destroy the One Ring is the only hope for the end of the Dark Lords reign.

movies.title: The Mistletoe Promise
movies.summary: Based on the bestselling book by Richard Paul Evans. Two strangers who don't enjoy Christmas meet at work and to avoid being lonely during the holidays make a pact to deal with holiday events together. But as they get to know each other they are able to begin enjoying Christmas. They soon realize that their contract may lead them down a road that neither expected resulting in questionable feelings.
